title: The exponential growth model A = 50e0.07t describes the population of a city in the Philippines in thousands, t years after 1997. What is the population in 2035? - Quora

response.answer_text: Find how many years that is 2035−1997=382035−1997=38 and plug it in A=50e0.07(38)∗1000A=50e0.07(38)∗1000 would be the population so. 0.07∗38=7∗38100=210+56100=2.660.07∗38=7∗38100=210+56100=2.66 right? A=50000e2.66A=50000e2.66 You can plug that or approximate it. You should get 714814.454934
